alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 9:46AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN FAYETTE, NORTHEASTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 AM EDT... At 946 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Sabina, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Sabina, Jeffersonville, Staunton, Bowersville, Port William, Milledgeville, Octa, Melvin, Rosemoor, Bloomington, Jasper Mills, Lees Creek and Reesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
